package.description:
This is a realtime visualizer for TREX
dbview uses xdot.py by Jose Fonseca, which is licensed under LGPL: http://code.google.com/p/jrfonseca/wiki/XDot
dbview uses pygtkcodebuffer.py which is license under LGPL: http://code.google.com/p/pygtkcodebuffer/
dbview uses gvgen.py by INL Software, which is licensed under GPLv2: http://software.inl.fr/trac/wiki/GvGen
package.author: Jonathan Bohren
